title: close button missing
body: i played a game and when i finished i closed my laptop down. I open it up and the match results pop up, i close them and home and profile are on the taskbar, and the setting, exit and etc. buttons are missing. i cant close it manually :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like an edge case that normally wouldn't occur often.

Perhaps try _not_ closing your laptop after a game ends and running through the results screen as expected, does the issue occur?
